result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: (1:57) 15CM350 & 15CM169: Defendant Richard Thomas Hall in court with attorney Steven J. Luchsinger.  Robert G. Barrington appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. Luchsinger heard - requesting he be appointed in 15CM350; Court questions Def. on payments for court appointed attorney; Court will appoint Atty. Luchsinger in 15CM350 (combined payment plan); State makes motion for joinder for purpose of trial to latter of 2 JT dates; Court grants motion and orders the JT in 15CT169  be removed and JT date will be 12/2/15; Atty. Luchsinger now wants that JT date pushed out 30 days; State heard on request; discussion held; recess taken for victim compliance; State heard - victim compliance; JT removed from both; STC 1/8/16 at 9:30am

Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with MSW f/w dob 12/11/49 or her residence.   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

9:14 - Defendant, Richard Thomas Hall in court, Intern Kevin Schmidt w/ADA Robert G. Barrington appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court enters Not Guilty plea. Court finds probable cause. RD & JT set. Court sets $500 PA bond with conditions:   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.   Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with MSW f/w dob 12/11/49 or her residence.  Return date scheduled for October 19, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for December 2, 2015 at 08:30 am.
